Html.name: Html0
Html.content:
These collectors are configurable using various parameters, e.g.:

currentuser :  set to true to collect for the current user
user :  set to a username to collect for this user
daysfrom, daysto :  specify the range when the collected resources must be visited (given as “days back from the current time”)

resource: specifies the folder where to collect
includesubfolders:  set to true if subfolders should be  included
